text: Harris Lee Wittels (June 20, 1984 â€“ February 19, 2015) was an American actor, comedian, writer, producer and musician. He was born in Oklahoma City and raised in Houston. He is best known for having been a writer for The Sarah Silverman Program, a writer, actor and executive producer for Parks and Recreation. Wittels died in Los Angeles on February 19, 2015 at the age of 30. ==References== Category:1984 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Actors from Houston Category:Actors from Oklahoma City Category:American television actors Category:American television producers Category:American television writers Category:Comedians from Texas Category:Musicians from Houston Category:Musicians from Oklahoma Category:Writers from Oklahoma City Category:Writers from Texas
title: Harris Wittels
